for_sales.sales_text: Designed and built by Fabian Bush, 2002, Poppy is a unique modern wooden classic. The details of her design, construction and finish emulate the Victorian sailing canoes popular over 100 years ago. At the same time she gains the advantages of modern plywood construction to give a wooden boat suitable for trailer sailing. She was built with especial care for robustness and durability and she can be maintained with comparative ease. In good condition, lightly used, with trailer, o/board, new cover, fenders, etc."

boat.full_description:
Designed and built by Fabian Bush, 2002, Poppy is a unique modern wooden classic. The details of her design, construction and finish emulate the Victorian sailing canoes popular over 100 years ago.

At the same time she gains the advantages of modern plywood construction to give a wooden boat suitable for trailer sailing. She was built with especial care for robustness and durability and she can be maintained with comparative ease.
boat.name: Poppy
boat.short_description: 'Poppy' is a unique modern wooden classic, built, 2002 by her designer, Fabian Bush. Her design, construction and finish emulate the Victorian sailing canoes popular in the late 19th century. She is eminently suited to trailer sailing.
